price: 13. (Alle waa) Kan idin tusiya Calaamooyin- kiisa oo idiinka soo dejiya risiq (roob) samada, cidise kuma waantowdo aan ahayn kawa u laabashada badan (Alle) ee toobad keenka badan.
arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُرِيكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ وَيُنَزِّلُ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ رِزۡقٗاۚ وَمَا يَتَذَكَّرُ إِلَّا مَن يُنِيبُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: huwa alladhī yurīkum āyātihi wayunazzilu lakum mina al-samāi riz'qan wamā yatadhakkaru illā man yunību
